interlinear-text.item: I am not going to plow anymore

phrase.item: I am not going to plow anymore.
I am not going to plow anymore.
My darling is on top of a high [place], she crumbled when she saw me.
I am a slave to her life.
I am not going to plow anymore.
My darling is on the mountain,
There is nothing I can do.
I am not going to plow anymore.
Golden binoculars are in her hand.
Looking through it, she will see me sometime.
I am not going to plow anymore.
